reports.summary: Root cause identified: Incomplete TODO.md updates during archival. The /todo command successfully moves tasks to archive/state.json and archive/ directories, but fails to remove their entries from TODO.md. Secondary issue: Status marker format inconsistency (88% of completed tasks use non-standard formats).

plans.summary: 5-phase implementation plan (12 hours): Phase 1 - Manual TODO.md cleanup and standardization (2h), Phase 2 - Debug /todo command Stage 4/5 logic (3h), Phase 3 - Systematic status marker enforcement (3h), Phase 4 - Test /todo command with standardized markers (1.5h), Phase 5 - Verification and documentation (2.5h). Addresses both root causes: incomplete TODO.md updates and status marker inconsistency.
